alert.note: Alert for Imperial County Southeast; Imperial Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:40PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Imperial County through 715 PM PDT... At 639 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Calexico, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Calexico, Holtville, Bonds Corner, and Heber. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 40 and 50. CA Route 111 between mile markers 1 and 9. CA Route 86 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
